question:
You plan to deploy an Azure Cosmos DB database that supports multi-master replication.You need to select a consistency level for the database to meet the following requirements:Provide a recovery point objective (RPO) of less than 15 minutes.Provide a recovery time objective (RTO) of zero minutes.What are three possible consistency levels that you can select? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
A.Strong
B.Bounded Staleness
C.Eventual
D.Session
E.Consistent Prefix
